tldr: This article describes an extraordinary cure for a man's surfeit and pain using a sweating treatment in hot turf. The patient was wrapped in baked turf and covered with blankets to trap the heat, while warm cordials were given to prevent fainting. The treatment was repeated, and the patient recovered fully. The author also provides a description of Indian hot-houses and their use in healing various ailments.
